content: “The current leak is only the latest in a series of massive security breaches (Snowden, Manning, etc.). If these secret-hoarding spy agencies can be so easily looted, how in the world can we citizens protect our own miserable little secrets?” ^ This quote seems to conflate technology vulnerabilities with leaking. Leaks will always be possible and cannot be solved with technology (see: ‘Analog hole’). There are better examples where NSA has harmed national security and our trust in government-backed standards (see: Dual_EC_DRBG).
